instruction.value: Administer by direct injection over 2 minutes.
Maintenance infusion: Titrate to desired effect.

additionalnotes.value: INFANT (less than 1 year of age):MAXIMUM: 2 mg/dose. Where required, the dose can be repeated 30 minutes after initial dose.
CHILDREN (1 TO 15 years of age):MAXIMUM: 5 mg/dose. Where required, the dose can be repeated 30 minutes after initial dose. MAXIMUM repeat dose: 10mg.
ADULT: If no response and no adverse event, may give 5 to 10 mg every 15 to 30 minutes to a total dose of 20 to 30 mg.

backgroundinformation.value: In patients with hepatic cirrhosis, reduce dose to 20% to 50% of normal dose and monitor BP for hypotension and PR prolongation.
In patients with hepatic cirrhosis, reduce dose to 20% to 50% of normal dose and monitor for abnormal PR prolongation or other adverse effects.
